dict.acceptation: 关系；注意；（尤指以某种方式）注视；尊敬；
看，凝视；留意；尊敬，喜爱；问候；

sent.orig: To regard ourself lightly is prajna(wisdom). To regard ourself highly is attachment.
sent.trans: 看淡自己的是般若，看重自己的是执着。

sent.orig: How does Darwin regard the idea and why does he regard it in this way?
sent.trans: 达尔文对此概念抱以什么想法？为何他要如此看待这个概念？

sent.orig: What are their broader interests with regard to nuclear nonproliferation, with regard to the Middle East?
sent.trans: 防止核扩散、中东等问题对他们有什么更广泛的利益？

sent.orig: This plant is up to the minute with regard to the equipment used.
sent.trans: 就使用的设备来说，这家工厂是最新的。

sent.orig: Additionally, this algorithm was tested with regard to gender differences.
sent.trans: 此外，根据性别差异对该算法进行检验。
